text: Hartmut Neugebauer (1942-2017) was a German actor and voice actor from Munich. He is known as the german voice of Robbie Coltrane (as Rubeus Hagrid) in the Harry Potter movie series. He also voiced Mr. Potato in the Toy Story movies. He was the german voice of Doctor Eggman in the Sonic the Hedgehog games. This role started with Sonic X. He was the father of the actress Veronika Neugebauer and the singer Myriam Neugebauer. title: Hartmut Neugebauer
